com.morpheus.sdk.internal

Interface CredentialsProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessTokenProvider, BasicCredentialsProvider

    public interface CredentialsProvider
    An interface for generating valid credentials for the Morpheus OAUTH Api This includes methods to attempt authentication with the remote server and renew tokens

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean authenticate(java.lang.String apiHost)
      Performs an authentication request if necessary and if successful, returns true.
      java.lang.String getAccessToken()
      Returns the OAuth access token that needs used for every subsequent API request
      java.lang.String getAuthenticationError()
      If an authentication error occurs.
      boolean isAuthenticated()
      Returns whether or not this provider is pre-authenticated or if an authenticate call must first be made.

    • Method Detail

      • isAuthenticated

        boolean isAuthenticated()
        Returns whether or not this provider is pre-authenticated or if an authenticate call must first be made.
        Returns:
        if successful true otherwise false

      • authenticate

        boolean authenticate(java.lang.String apiHost)
        Performs an authentication request if necessary and if successful, returns true. Otherwise returns false and sets the authentication error property.
        Parameters:
        apiHost - the api Host being authenticated against. (i.e. https://v2.gomorpheus.com)
        Returns:
        true/false depending on success

      • getAccessToken

        java.lang.String getAccessToken()
        Returns the OAuth access token that needs used for every subsequent API request
        Returns:
        oauth based Access Token (null if not authenticated)

      • getAuthenticationError

        java.lang.String getAuthenticationError()
        If an authentication error occurs. This property will return a human readable value of the authentication error.
        Returns:
        an error String if an error occurred during authentication
